original_title: According to Plan: The Story of Modern Sidewalls for the Homes of America
overview: The beauty and functionality of asbestos sidewalls. With a visit to Levittown, N.Y. and an interview with Norman Denny, vice president of materials for Levitt & Sons, builders. An excellent film on Fifties standardized building processes.
title: According to Plan: The Story of Modern Sidewalls for the Homes of America
